DOC.brief_summary: This randomized phase II trial compared pathologic response rates (pCR) of early breast cancer following neoadjuvant fluorouracil-epirubicin-cyclophosphamide(FEC) and capecitabine-epirubicin-cyclophosphamide (XEC).
DOC.brief_title: Neoadjuvant Trial of Capecitabine for Axillary Lymph Node Positive Operable Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Females aged 1870 with histologically proven, corebiopsied, Stage IIIII invasive breast cancer No distant disease Inadequate heart or liver or kidney function
